footer.title: BJJ Insight
footer.description: Personalized advice from your favorite athletes.

herobanner.title1: Progress with those who inspire you.

benefits.title: User Benefits
benefits.description: With BJJ Insight, you ask a specific question about your practice, technique, strategy, mental preparation or even recovery and you receive a clear, direct, and personalized answer from a confirmed athlete. No more searching through hours of generic videos: you save time, progress faster, and benefit from the experience of those who live at the highest level daily.

functionalities.title: Key Features
functionalities.feature1: Ask a question in 1 click, receive a personalized video response.
functionalities.feature2: Request technical, mental or strategic advice.
functionalities.feature3: Access athletes from around the world.

exampleAthlete.title: Become an Expert
exampleAthlete.subtitle: Stop giving free advice.
exampleAthlete.benefit1: Share your expertise with {{highlight}}Jiu-Jitsu{{/highlight}} practitioners worldwide and grow your community.
exampleAthlete.benefit2: Monetize your time by offering 1-on-1 consultations and personalized training to your audience.
exampleAthlete.defaultQuote: Passionate Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu expert, I share my expertise and knowledge with the BJJI community to help every practitioner progress in their discipline.
exampleAthlete.fallbackQuote: BJJI allowed me to connect with a passionate Jiu-Jitsu community and share my expertise with practitioners from around the world.
